org.shortbrain.vaadin.container.annotation.reader

Class BeanAbstractAnnotationReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shortbrain.vaadin.container.annotation.reader.BeanAbstractAnnotationReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the Annotation.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainerBeanAnnotationReader

    public abstract class BeanAbstractAnnotationReader<T>
extends Object
    Generic annotation reader. This currently only work on annotation for Type.
    Author:
    Vincent Demeester

                            Class<?> beanClass)
        Creates a BeanAbstractAnnotationReader.
        Parameters:
        originalBeanClass - the original bean type.
        beanClass - the annotated bean type (might be a parent).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the originalBeanClass or beanClass is null.

      • getField

        protected Field getField(Class<?> klass,
             String fieldName)
                  throws NoSuchFieldException
        Get the Field for the given class and parents.
        Parameters:
        klass - the class where we will look for the field.
        fieldName - the name of the field.
        Returns:
        the field or null if we cannot find the field.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if klass or fieldName are null.
        NoSuchFieldException

      • getAnnotatedClass

        public static Class<?> getAnnotatedClass(Class<?> beanClass,
                         Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass)
        Get the annotated type by walking in superclass to find the annotation
        Parameters:
        beanClass - The type that should be annotated
        annotationClass - the type of the annotation
        Returns:
        the "real" type annotated, either entityClass or a parent.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if entityClass or annotationClass are null or if entityClass (and its parent) is not annotated with annotationClass.
